metadata.title: CVE-2024-42272 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sched: act_ct: take care of padding in struct zones_ht_keyBlamed commit increased lookup key size from 2 bytes to 16 bytes,because zones_ht_key got a struct net pointer.Make sure rhashtable_lookup() is not using the padding byteswhich are not initialized.
